reviews.title: No English
reviews.comment: With the description in English you would think that includes English info or options. Please add languages in the description or better yet the app itself.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: English please
reviews.comment: A factory tour of electronics companies would be nice, or a tour of any LED company such as Everlight
